subject: CSS
question:
Please list and describe the posible values for align-items and align-self:

1.
2.
3.
4.
answer:
1. stretch (initial) : Stretches all flex items (or the item if used align-self) to fill the parent in the direction of the cross axis. If the parent hasn't got a fixed width in the cross axis direction, then all flex items will become as long as the longest flex items.
2. center : Centers all flex items (or the item if used align-self) along the cross axis. Items maintain their intrinsic dimensions.
3. flex-start : Aligns all flex items (or the item if used align-self) at the start of the cross axis. Items maintain their intrinsic dimensions.
4. flex-end : Aligns all flex items (or the item if used align-self) at the end of the cross axis. Items maintain their intrinsic dimensions.
